dcterms:description: Rebate data from the Clean Cars 4 All Program (CC4A) provides publicly available data at the transaction level on the usage of a particular subsidy for EV usage targeted at individuals from lower income brackets. This data includes the subsidy, the vehicle purchased, and the zipcode in which the recipient of the subsidy resides.
dcterms:title: Clean Cars 4 All Program (CC4A) Rebate Data

dcterms:description: Data from the Alternative Fuels Data Center provides information on the number of public chargers present in any zipcode for each quarter.
dcterms:title: Alternative Fuels Data Center (for public chargers)

dcterms:description: Data from the American Community Survey provides income data used in the analysis of EV adoption.
dcterms:title: American Community Survey (for income data)

dcterms:description: Data from the State of California provides counts of electric vehicle (EV) adoptions used in the analysis.
dcterms:title: State of California (for EV adoption counts)

dcterms:creator: Cox Automotive
dcterms:description: Data on electric vehicle (EV) sales, indicating trends and statistics related to EV sales in the market.
dcterms:title: Cox Automotive (for EV sales data)

dcterms:creator: E. Muehlegger
D. S. Rapson
dcterms:description: Various studies referenced for comparisons regarding the impact of subsidies on electric vehicle adoption.
dcterms:title: Various studies referenced for comparisons (e.g., Muehlegger and Rapson)
